timeline_marilyn:
5:55 pm - Arrived at party
6:30 pm - Went upstairs to get air on patio
7:00 pm - Returns to dining room for dinner
7:40 pm - Starts towards Library to look at painting. Notices Sebastian heading upstairs
7:50 pm - Learns of murder in Dining Room
notes_marilyn:
- conspicuous and flamboyant lady
- seems sort of unnerving beneath the public persona
 - didn't know the victim well
timeline_sebastian:
4:00 pm - Arrived at party
5:50 pm - Started greeting guests
6:15 pm - Went to kitchen to help staff
7:00 pm - Arrives in dining room with food and staff
7:30 pm - Returns to kitchen for cleanup
7:45 pm - Learns of murder from Victoria
notes_sebastian:
- party manager and coordinator
- hired last minute
- wasn't well informed about guest count or health concerns
- seems agitated
timeline_roman:
5:45 pm - Arrives at party and chats with guests
6:20 pm - Goes to game room to play cards with Vincent
6:55 pm - Starts back towards dining room
7:00 pm - Eats dinner with Marilyn
7:30 pm - Goes with Victoria upstairs
7:45 - Learns of murder while talking to Sebastian
notes_roman:
- most well-to-do guest here
- said he lost big time to Vincent in poker
- claims it was all in good fun
- seems remorseful
timeline_victoria:
5:50 pm - Leaves room to greet guests
6:20 pm - Goes to library to read
7:00 pm - Returns to eat dinner
7:30 pm - Goes upstairs with Roman, who she claimed was irritated
7:40 pm - Leaves Roman to go check on dad, finds the body
7:45 - Informs Roman of death
7:50 - Informs others of death downstairs
notes_victoria:
- daughter of the victim
- mostly staying quiet and wants to be alone
- could be shook up
- mentioned mother passed away recently
timeline_b:
5:40 pm - Arrives at the party
6:30 pm - Goes to garage to view cars
6:40 - Heads back to dining room, bumps into Victoria
7:00 pm - Has dinner with Vincent and his daughter
7:10 pm - Notices Sebastian and Vincent having tense exchange
7:30 pm - Goes to library to see painting
7:50 pm - Learns of murder in dining room
notes_b:
- no one seems to know who he is
- claims to have been personally invited by Vincent
- seems like a charming, yet elusive person
